s: ^Hi there! Welcome to Robin Hair. How can I help you?

request: ^Hey. Um... I'm just looking to get a haircut.

s: ^Well of course! Please, come have a seat.

c-0: ^Alright what are we looking for today?

question: ^Honestly, I've just been growing my hair out for a while and I don't really know what style I want to go for.
ev
str
/str
/ev

s: ^Wow. You weren't kidding. That's a lot of hair. By the way, what's your name?

name: ^Oh uh... my name is Matthew.
ev
str
/str
/ev

s: ^Alright Matthew, so there's a few ways we can go about this. We could go for a shorter style or a longer style.

style: ^I've always had short hair so I guess we can just go with that.

s: ^Aw, come on Matthew. You grew out all this thick and maginificient hair. You can't just go back to how things were. That would be a waste!

decline: ^Nah man, it's ok. I'm thinking of going short.

s: ^Right. Ok, yea it's up to you what you want to do with your hair. But are you still ok giving me permission to take your hair.

confusion: ^Bro what? Take my hair? You into some weird stuff or something?

s: ^Oh sorry I meant like take it off the top y'know. Isn't that how you young people say it these days. Ha Ha...

decision: ^Just give me my cut before I change my mind.

c-1: ^ Wait. WHAT ARE YOU DOING! LET GO OF ME!

haircut: ^Ayy, you know what. I actually like it. You had me on the fence but I guess you're actually not a bad guy too.

s: ^I mean it truly is the least I can do.

conclusion: ^Here's an extra tip for your work. I'll even recommend people to come give your shop a try.

s: ^Ay, only if they have nice hair like you. Ha ha... ha.
